ComicInfo.Title: Peace Pipe; Cracked Interviews Gummi the Clayboy King!; Cracked Lottery Nuts; The Donkees; The Beignning of Fire!; What's on Their Minds?; Murder, She Wrot; The Minute after the Meineke Commercial!; Monster Party; One-Shots; Cracked's 10 Most Unwanted List; Designer Genes; Growing Painful; On the Beach!; What the Headlines Really Mean; The Creation of a Hit TV Show!; A Weighty Matter!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hudd and Dini escape into a Native American village and accept an offered peace pipe. The smoke makes them so sick they're easily recaptured.
Hudd and Dini tunnel into a costume party and are frightened by the people wearing costumes.
